Tutorial: 2016-09-07-components

2016-09-07-components

layout: page_documentation title: "Components" category: system_manual

date: 2016-09-07 17:33:39

A series of components developed during R&D of the project, some have been used in the final version fo the app, some turned out to be redudant for current iteration. As well as some apps that were made either along side or before that influenced the project.

In use in the app

  • NWJS Boilerplate
  • Gentle stt node module
  • EDL Composer
  • Srt Composer
  • Date now
  • Transcriber (IBM Watson STT)
  • Metadata Reader
  • HTML5 Webm Video converter

Not in use in the app

  • srt_parser_composer on npm
  • HTML5 Ogg Video converter
  • Captions burner
  • Twitter video api export
  • Video trimmer

Related proejcts

  • Transcriber app
  • Captions Burner
  • quickQuote Rails
  • quickQuote Node
